Inputs
~~~~~~


[Mandatory]

+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
| | **anat_file**: a file name (mandatory)                          |
| |     an image of the underlying neuroanatomy                     |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
| | **mesh_file**: a file name (mandatory)                          |
| |     mesh file of interest                                       |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
| | **texture_file**: a file name (mandatory)                       |
| |     an image from which to extract texture (for the mesh file)  |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
| | **white_mesh_file**: a file name (mandatory)                    |
| |     a mesh file of the underlying neuroanatomy                  |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------+

[Optional]
